channel.title: Auxy Forum - Unicorn Hall of Fame
channel.description:
TᕼE ᑌᑎIᑕOᖇᑎ ᕼᗩᒪᒪ Oᖴ ᖴᗩᗰE =
тнιs ιs тнε αυxү ғσяυм's υηιcσяη нαℓℓ σғ ғαмε.
яεcιριεηтs σғ тнε εℓυsιvε ριηк υηιcσяη αяε мαякε∂ ιη тнιs тняεα∂.
σηℓү тнσsε ωнσ ∂σ gσσ∂ тнιηgs мαү gαιη α υηιcσяη :unicorn:
> **001 - Kayasho:** Auxy Forum Track of the Year (2017) - Apprentice Angel On Shooting Hill by DJ Totto (Remix). > > **002 - Conux:** 2nd best Auxy Forum Track of the year (2017) - Kleuren > > **003 - Mr Anderson:** 3rd best Auxy Forum Track of the Year (2017) - Catalyst. > > **004 - aUstin Haga:** 4th best Auxy Forum Track of the Year (2017) - Changes. > > **005 - aUstin Haga:** 5th best Auxy Forum Track of the Year (2017) - Shatter. > > **006 - aUstin Haga:** Auxy Forum Producer of the Year (2017) > > **007 - Decruz:** Auxy Forum's 2nd Best producer of the Year (2017) > > **008 - Moemx:** Auxy Forum's 3rd Best Producer of the Year (2017) > > **009 - NEWNAMES:** Auxy Forum's 4th Best Producer of the Year (2017) > [Now: AntarcticStars] > > **010 - Southborne:** Auxy Forum's 5th Best Producer of the Year (2017) > > **011 - Southborne:** Auxy Forum's Most Supportive Forum Member (2017) > > **012 - HAYVN:** Auxy Forum's 2nd Most Supportive Forum Member (2017) > > **013 - Stereofield:** Auxy Forum's 3rd Most Supportive Forum Member (2017) > > **014 - Mr Mooo:** Auxy Forum's 4th Most Supportive Forum Member (2017) > > **015 - Voltt:** Auxy Forum's 5th Most Supportive Forum Member (2017) > [Now: TXA] > >**016 - Produk:** Creating multiple [Auxy Tutorials](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_3JKnTlBu8mxYth3zO7Pkw/videos) to assist the Auxy community. > > **017 - DJ La Rocca:** Creating multiple [Auxy Tutorials](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XC1lBXJBsGE&list=PLwLljOW4mpGSPmNokS4kR1UF7omoYAnH2) to assist the Auxy community. > >**018 - Alyen:** For reviewing heaps of forum member's music in this [thread](https://disco.auxy.co/t/i-wanna-hear-your-music/2967). > >**019 - nrgb (now Blakkaz):** For regularly injecting quality humour into the forum. Dude, you funny! > >**020 - INDIR3CT:** Winner of Easter Drum & Bass Challenge (2018) > >**021 - Kayasho:** Winner of Easter Drum & Bass Challenge (2018) > >**022 - IntrepidMusic:** Winner of Easter Drum & Bass Challenge (2018) - With HAYVN. > >**023 - DHO:** For hosting the 2nd Auxy Tournament (2018). > >**024 - Andrew Adams:** Winner of 2nd Auxy Tournament (2018). > >**025 - Sunny:** Second in 2nd Auxy Tournament (2018). > >**026 - Xiejra:** Winner [3rd Auxy Tournament (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/contest-third-auxy-tournament/9097) > >**027 - Foxlike:** Second in [3rd Auxy Tournament (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/contest-third-auxy-tournament/9097) > >**028 - NotMiles:** As at June 2018, @NotMiles has most topics read, most likes given and most likes received over all time. > >**029 - ToxicCaves64:** Winner of [Auxy Summer Tournament (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/contest-auxy-summer-tournament-2k18/10333). > >**030 - Mr_Anderson :** Second place in [Auxy Summer Tournament (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/contest-auxy-summer-tournament-2k18/10333). > >**031 - Andrew Adams:** Hosting Auxy Summer Tournament (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/contest-auxy-summer-tournament-2k18/10333). (Thanks to DHO who also hosted, but already has a unicorn for hosting). > >**032 - Xlimator:** Winner of [Beat the Clock: RAP Challenge](https://disco.auxy.co/t/beat-the-clock-rap-challenge/12310/133) (Sept 2018) > >**033 - Goxenar:** Host and vocalist for [Beat the Clock: RAP Challenge](https://disco.auxy.co/t/beat-the-clock-rap-challenge/12310/133) (Sept 2018) > > ===== Auxy Forum Awards (2018) ===== > > **034 - Kayasho:** [Winner - Auxy Forum Track of the Year (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-awards-2018-winners) --- [KevinHood](https://soundcloud.com/kayashokayasho/kevinhood-ep-2-kevinhood) > > **035 - BlackOcean:** [2nd Place - Auxy Track of the Year (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-awards-2018-winners) --- [Odyssey](https://soundcloud.com/blckocean/blackocean-phluze-odyssey) > > **036 - Phluze:** [2nd Place - Auxy Track of the Year (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-awards-2018-winners) --- [Odyssey](https://soundcloud.com/blckocean/blackocean-phluze-odyssey) > > **037 - Best Producer (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-awards-2018-winners) > > **039 - NotMiles:** [2nd= Best Producer (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-awards-2018-winners) > > **040 - Stereofield:** [2nd= Best Producer (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-awards-2018-winners) > > **041 - Kayasho:** [Winner - Most Innovative Track (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-awards-2018-winners) --- [198x](https://soundcloud.com/kayashokayasho/198x) > > **042 - NotMiles:** [Winner - Most Innovative Producer of the Year (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-awards-2018-winners) > > **043 - Mr Mooo:** [Winner - Most Supportive forum member (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-awards-2018-winners) > > **044 - Hum4n01d:** [2nd Place - Most Supportive forum member (2018)](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-awards-2018-winners) > > **045 - item.title: Auxy Forum - Unicorn Hall of Fame
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.source: Auxy Forum - Unicorn Hall of Fame

item.title: Auxy Forum - Unicorn Hall of Fame
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
TᕼE ᑌᑎIᑕOᖇᑎ ᕼᗩᒪᒪ Oᖴ ᖴᗩᗰE

тнιs ιs тнε αυxү ғσяυм’s υηιcσяη нαℓℓ σғ ғαмε.

яεcιριεηтs σғ тнε εℓυsιvε ριηк υηιcσяη αяε мαякε∂ ιη тнιs тняεα∂.

σηℓү тнσsε ωнσ ∂σ gσσ∂ тнιηgs мαү gαιη α υηιcσяη

001 - Kayasho: Auxy Forum Track of the Year (2017) - Apprentice Angel On Shooting Hill by DJ Totto (Remix).

002 - Conux: 2nd best Auxy Forum Track of the year (2017) - Kleuren

003 - Mr Anderson: 3rd best Auxy Forum Track of the Year (2017) - Catalyst.

004 - aUstin Haga: 4th best Auxy Forum Track of the Year (2017) - Changes.

005 - aUstin Haga: 5th best Auxy Forum Track of the Year (2017) - Shatter.

006 - aUstin Haga: Auxy Forum Producer of the Year (2017)

007 - Decruz: Auxy Forum’s 2nd Best producer of the Year (2017)

008 - Moemx: Auxy Forum’s 3rd Best Producer of the Year (2017)

009 - NEWNAMES: Auxy Forum’s 4th Best Producer of the Year (2017)
[Now: AntarcticStars]

010 - Southborne: Auxy Forum’s 5th Best Producer of the Year (2017)

011 - Southborne: Auxy Forum’s Most Supportive Forum Member (2017)

012 - HAYVN: Auxy Forum’s 2nd Most Supportive Forum Member (2017)

013 - Stereofield: Auxy Forum’s 3rd Most Supportive Forum Member (2017)

014 - Mr Mooo: Auxy Forum’s 4th Most Supportive Forum Member (2017)

015 - Voltt: Auxy Forum’s 5th Most Supportive Forum Member (2017)
[Now: TXA]

016 - Produk: Creating multiple Auxy Tutorials to assist the Auxy community.

017 - DJ La Rocca: Creating multiple Auxy Tutorials to assist the Auxy community.

018 - Alyen: For reviewing heaps of forum member’s music in this thread.

019 - nrgb (now Blakkaz): For regularly injecting quality humour into the forum. Dude, you funny!

020 - INDIR3CT: Winner of Easter Drum & Bass Challenge (2018)

021 - Kayasho: Winner of Easter Drum & Bass Challenge (2018)

022 - IntrepidMusic: Winner of Easter Drum & Bass Challenge (2018) - With HAYVN.

023 - DHO: For hosting the 2nd Auxy Tournament (2018).

024 - Andrew Adams: Winner of 2nd Auxy Tournament (2018).

025 - Sunny: Second in 2nd Auxy Tournament (2018).

026 - Xiejra: Winner 3rd Auxy Tournament (2018)

027 - Foxlike: Second in 3rd Auxy Tournament (2018)

028 - NotMiles: As at June 2018, @NotMiles has most topics read, most likes given and most likes received over all time.

029 - ToxicCaves64: Winner of Auxy Summer Tournament (2018).

030 - Mr_Anderson : Second place in Auxy Summer Tournament (2018).

031 - Andrew Adams: Hosting Auxy Summer Tournament (2018)]([CONTEST] Auxy Summer Tournament 2K18!). (Thanks to DHO who also hosted, but already has a unicorn for hosting).

032 - Xlimator: Winner of Beat the Clock: RAP Challenge (Sept 2018)

033 - Goxenar: Host and vocalist for Beat the Clock: RAP Challenge (Sept 2018)

===== Auxy Forum Awards (2018) =====

034 - Kayasho: Winner - Auxy Forum Track of the Year (2018) — KevinHood

035 - BlackOcean: 2nd Place - Auxy Track of the Year (2018) — Odyssey

036 - Phluze: 2nd Place - Auxy Track of the Year (2018) — Odyssey

037 - Thrashie: 3rd Place - Auxy Track of the Year (2018) — Anti-Edo

038 - Kayasho: Winner - Best Producer (2018)

039 - NotMiles: 2nd= Best Producer (2018)

040 - Stereofield: 2nd= Best Producer (2018)

041 - Kayasho: Winner - Most Innovative Track (2018) — 198x

042 - NotMiles: Winner - Most Innovative Producer of the Year (2018)

043 - Mr Mooo: Winner - Most Supportive forum member (2018)

044 - Hum4n01d: 2nd Place - Most Supportive forum member (2018)

045 - Arimyth: 3rd= Place - Most Supportive forum member (2018)

046 - Hexx: 3rd= Place - Most Supportive forum member (2018)

047 - Arimyth: For hosting the 2018 Auxy Awards

====================================

048 - MrSerpent: 1st equal - Auxy Winter Tournament (2018-19).

049 - MrAnderson: 1st equal - Auxy Winter Tournament (2018-19).

050 - Arimyth: Founder of Auxy Collective.

051 - Goxenar: Winner of HYDRANS Insurgency Remix Challenge.

052 - Surf: Second place in HYDRANS Insurgency Remix Challenge.

053 - Arimyth: Winner of Auxy Forum Track of the Week logo competition

054 - ToxicCaves: Winner of Auxy Sumer Tournament 2019

055 - HYDRANS: 2nd place - Auxy Sumer Tournament 2019

056 - El1011: Semi finals - Auxy Sumer Tournament 2019

057 - Thomaisho: Semi finals - Auxy Sumer Tournament 2019

058 - DHO: - Running multiple Auxy forum tournaments.

059 - Stereofield: - Running multiple Auxy forum tournaments.

060 - BobTheGUYYYYY - Running multiple Auxy forum tournaments.

061 - Mr Serpent - Winner Unicorn Minimalism Challenge (Dec 2019)

062 - DJ_spedgetti - Winner Unicorn Minimalism Challenge (Dec 2019)

063 - Crystldawn -Winner Unicorn Minimalism Challenge (Dec 2019)

===== Auxy Forum Awards (2019) =====

064 - Mr_Mooo - Winner: Fav Track of 2019 - Chrysalism

065 - MrSerpent - Winner: Fav Producer of 2019 - Soundcloud link.

066 - ToxicCaves64 - Winner: Most innovative track of 2019 - Paradise '87

067 - MrSerpent - Winner: Most Supportive forum member of 2019

068 - INDIR3CT - Host of the the 2019 Auxy Forum Awards

================================

069 - tornait - Winner - Unicorn Challenge Jan 2020

070 - Twizard - Winner - Unicorn Challenge Jan 2020

071 - BobTheGUYYYYY - Winner - Unicorn Challenge Jan 2020

===== Auxy Forum Tournament (Dec 19 - Mar 2020) =====

072 - Dadmother - Tournament winner

073 - Tolberto - Second Place

073 - NeXus - Semi finalist

073 - Toveii - Semi finalist

=============================================

074 - Paroxyzm - Winner - Unicorn Challenge Feb 2020

075 - Drageonix - Winner - Unicorn Challenge Feb 2020

076 - sn.ow.y - Winner - Unicorn Challenge Feb 2020

=============================================

078 - cursed - Winner - April Fool’s Day Unicorn Challenge 2020

Read full topic
item.source: Auxy Forum - Unicorn Hall of Fame
